Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "vue-router0.7.13在个别手机页面不跳转的问题" (#1860) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
<!--
IMPORTANT: Please use the following link to create a new issue:

  https://new-issue.vuejs.org/?repo=vuejs/vue-router

If your issue was not created using the app above, it will be closed immediately.
-->
用vue1.x+vue-router0.7.13采用router.go跳转页面，在实际生产中出现了页面不能跳转的情况，想问题vue-router对手机是不是有兼容性问题

fix #1030 

Just using the state object of module instead of manually calling the function in the store constructor.
